books.title: The Great Gatsby
books.author: F. Scott Fitzgerald
books.summary: The story primarily concerns the young and mysterious millionaire Jay Gatsby and his quixotic passion and obsession with the beautiful former debutante Daisy Buchanan.

books.title: The Catcher in the Rye
books.author: J. D. Salinger
books.summary: The story is told in the first person by Holden Caulfield, a cynical teenager who recently has been expelled from prep school.

books.title: The Grapes of Wrath
books.author: John Steinbeck
books.summary: The novel tells the story of the Joad family, who are driven from their Oklahoma homestead and forced to travel west to the promised land of California.
